mapper.insert: insert into test_mybatis_insert(date, month, name, domain, code, number, type, province, count, level, model, address, price, remark) values (#{entity.date}, #{entity.month}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.domain}, #{entity.code}, #{entity.number}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.count}, #{entity.level}, #{entity.model}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.price}, #{entity.remark})

(#{entity.date}, #{entity.month}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.domain}, #{entity.code}, #{entity.number}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.count}, #{entity.level}, #{entity.model}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.price}, #{entity.remark})
